2nd International Conference on

Bioprocess for Sustainable Environment and Energy

[ICBSEE-India-2022]

05 - 07 March


ICBSEE-India-2022 will enlighten the field of Energy-Environment-Bioprocess. The main theme of the conference is â€œBioprocess: From Research to Real Life" which covers a wide range of critically important sessions. ICBSEE-India-2022 would provide a platform for the interaction between the Scientist communities around the world and aims in establishing pollution free sustainable environment by accelerating the cutting edge Bioprocess Technologies.
ICBSEE-India-2022 provides the combined arena of government-academia-industry to incorporate all potential aspects in approaching one-foot step ahead towards MAKING SWACHHA BHARAT


Important Dates and Announcements

Abstract Submission is Open Now
There is an opportunity for International students to participate via e-presentation. Limited papers will be selected for e-presentation, the deadline of abstract submission for e-presentation is 31st January 2022. Registration fees for e-presentation: 50 USD

Papers
Abstract submission deadline April 30, 2022
Extended Abstract submission deadline May 7, 2022

Early Bird Registration Jan 31, 2022
